entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
